wiki_section_title: 2009 squad

wiki_section_text: 

intro: 2009 marks nine years since UTC was founded, and the 4th year of the Catalans Dragons in the Super League. They also competed for the 2009 Challenge Cup.

qa.question: In what year did the loose forward in the 2009 season for Catalans Dragons announce his retirement ?
